entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:44 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:44 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:44 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
